author: LiBrainian Core Team
description: Detects semantically equivalent existing functions before agents generate new implementations
agentDescription: Detects semantically equivalent existing functions before agents generate new implementations. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: core, process, preset, quality, agentic. Use this construction when an agent task matches semantic duplicate detector workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.

examples.title: Example 1
examples.description: Run semantic-duplicate-detector for a relevant intent
